means: 未损坏的，未损伤的，未弄糟的

sentence.Network_en: Their sleek , unmarred pelts are prime quarry for seal hunters.
sentence.Network_cn: 它们的一身光顺完好的毛皮,是海豹猎人们的首要目标.

sentences.sentence: "fragile tracery that must be preserved unmutilated and distinct"- B.N.Cardozo

auth_sentence.content: If so, then Mr. Clutter could, when addressing his Thanksgiving table, recite a blessing of unmarred gratitude.
